org.dmd.mvw.client.gxtmenus.implementation
Class GxtMenuFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.mvw.client.mvwmenus.base.MvwMenuFactory
      org.dmd.mvw.client.gxtmenus.implementation.GxtMenuFactory

public class GxtMenuFactory
extends MvwMenuFactory

The GxtMenuFactory provides a menu system implementation based on the GXT widget set.

Method Detail

createMenu

public MvwMenu createMenu(java.lang.String menuType,
                          java.lang.String menuName)
Description copied from class: MvwMenuFactory
This method should be overloaded to instantiate the type of menu specified. The various menu types are defined as part of a MenuImplementationConfig in whatever module is implementing the menu functionality.

Specified by:
createMenu in class MvwMenuFactory
Parameters:
menuType - The menu type.
menuName - The unique name of the menu.
Returns:
an appropriate menu implementation.

createSubMenu

public MvwMenu createSubMenu(java.lang.String menuType,
                             java.lang.String itemName,
                             java.lang.String menuOrder,
                             java.lang.String addToMenu,
                             boolean dynamic,
                             java.lang.String label,
                             com.google.gwt.resources.client.ImageResource image)
Description copied from class: MvwMenuFactory
This method should be overloaded to instantiate the type of submenu specified. The various submenu types are defined as part of a MenuImplementationConfig in whatever module is implementing the menu functionality.

Specified by:
createSubMenu in class MvwMenuFactory
Parameters:
menuType - The menu type.
itemName - The unique name of the item.
menuOrder - The item's place within the menu.
addToMenu - The menu to which it should be added.
dynamic - Whether or not the item is dynamic.
label - The display label for the submenu or null if this is just an image button.
image - The image for the submenu, or null if no image is to be displayed.
Returns:
an appropriate submenu implementation.

createMenuItem

public MvwMenuItem createMenuItem(java.lang.String itemType,
                                  java.lang.String itemName,
                                  java.lang.String menuOrder,
                                  java.lang.String addToMenu,
                                  boolean dynamic,
                                  java.lang.String actionName,
                                  java.lang.String label,
                                  com.google.gwt.resources.client.ImageResource image)
Description copied from class: MvwMenuFactory
This method should be overloaded to instantiate the specified type of menu item. This various item types are defined as part of a MenuImplementationConfig in whatever module is implementing the menu functionality.

Specified by:
createMenuItem in class MvwMenuFactory
Parameters:
itemType - The item type.
itemName - The unique name of the item.
menuOrder - The item's place within the menu.
addToMenu - The menu to which it should be added.
dynamic - Whether or not the item is dynamic.
actionName - The name of the action to be triggered.
label - The display label for the item or null if this is just an image button.
image - The image for the item, or null if no image is to be displayed.
Returns:
an appropriate menu item implementation

This method should be overloaded to instantiate the specified type of separator. This various item types are defined as part of a MenuImplementationConfig in whatever module is implementing the menu functionality.

Specified by:
createSeparator in class MvwMenuFactory
Parameters:
separatorType - The separator type.
itemName - The unique name of the item.
menuOrder - The item's place within the menu.
addToMenu - The menu to which it should be added.
dynamic - Whether or not the item is dynamic.
Returns:
an appropriate menu separator implementation.
